src:
Gas Metana dalam Septic Tank: Mudah Meledak Hingga Jadi Sumber Listrik
06 Nov 2019, 12:23 by Rakhmad Hidayatulloh Permana
Jakarta - Sebuah septic tank di rumah warga di Cakung, Jakarta Timur, meledak dan menewaskan satu orang. Penyebabnya diduga karena tumpukan gas metana berpuluh-puluh tahun. Gas metana diketahui memilki sifat mudah meledak hingga bisa jadi sumber energi listrik.
Peneliti Utama Teknologi Lingkungan di Loka Penelitian Teknologi Bersih LIPI, Neni Sintawardani menjelaskan, gas metana bisa muncul di septic tank dari aktivitas alami mikroba yang disebut proses anaerobik. Selama proses tersebut, mikroba menguraikan tinja hingga menghasilkan gas metana. Gas metana diketahui memiliki sifat mudah terbakar.
"Selama proses itu, mikroba itu akan mengonsumsi tinjanya, menguraikannya dan menghasilkan biogas. Biogasnya terdiri dari banyak gas, terutama adalah gas metana. Gas metana itu gas yang mudah meledak atau terbakar," ujar Neni saat dihubungi detikcom, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Karena memiliki sifat yang mudah terbakar ini, lanjut Neni, gas metana kerap dimanfaatkan sebagai sumber energi. Salah satunya ialah sumber energi listrik.
"Dan itu biasanya jadi sumber energi kalau kita bisa memanfaatkannya, seperti misalnya untuk listrik. Itulah yang terjadi di dalam septic tank secara umum," jelas Neni.
text:
Methane Gas in Septic Tanks: Easy to Explode Until Become a Source of Electricity
06 Nov 2019, 12:23 by Rakhmad Hidayatulloh Permana
Jakarta - A septic tank in a resident's home in Cakung, East Jakarta, exploded and killed one person. The cause is allegedly due to decades of pile of methane gas. Methane gas is known to have explosive properties that could be a source of electrical energy.
Principal Researcher of Environmental Technology at the LIPI Clean Technology Research Station, Neni Sintawardani explained, methane gas can appear in septic tanks from natural microbial activities called anaerobic processes. During the process, microbes break down feces to produce methane gas. Methane gas is known to have flammable properties.
"During the process, the microbes will consume their feces, decompose them and produce biogas. The biogas consists of a lot of gas, mainly methane gas. Methane gas is explosive or combustible gas," Neni said when contacted by AFP on Wednesday (6/11 / 2019).
Because it has these flammable properties, continued Neni, methane gas is often used as an energy source. One of them is the source of electrical energy.
"And that usually becomes an energy source if we can use it, such as for electricity. That is what happens in septic tanks in general," explained Neni.
